alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Laurens; Macon; Pulaski; Schley; Sumter; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:08AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Laurens, south central Macon, northwestern Dodge, Pulaski, northwestern Wilcox, Dooly, Bleckley, southeastern Houston, southeastern Schley, northeastern Sumter and northern Crisp Counties through 845 AM EDT... At 808 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area to near Unadilla to near Lilly to Bumphead, and moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Cochran, Eastman, Hawkinsville, Vienna, Unadilla, Chester, Byromville, Cadwell, Pineview, Pinehurst, Leslie, Andersonville, Lilly, De Soto, Cobb, Lamar, Plainfield, New Era and Mobley Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Laurens; Macon; Pulaski; Schley; Sumter; Wilcox
